data.title: Best burger in town
data.text: Stopped there for lunch. Hamburgers are the best. You can taste that freshness. Not your typical frozen burgers. Even thoug seating area is very limited the place is very clean. Their fajita plates, bbq beef ribs and gyro sandwiches are great as well.

data.title: Great food
data.text: Love this place the food is good haven't had a dish yet that didn't satisfy  me. I tell everyone at the salon how good the food is....We're all hooked.

data.title: First time.....Will be back again!
data.text: We wanted to have some barbecue this evening, and this little place right down the road was the only place open after 9:30 p.m. just the right size manual with just the right amount of items. The staff was great, two women cooking and taking your order very friendly... Food was great, not to mention large portions for a very affordable price. A buddy and I ate for under 20 bucks for both of us..... can I get the quality of food and service for that price many places. We definitely will be back soon.
